reviews.title: Seamless and fast product switch
reviews.text: Switching to a new product took up no more than 5 mins of my time. Placed a callback request through the website and received a call within an hour. Paperwork was sent immediately and when I returned it the switch happened in less than an hour. Shockingly efficient service - would highly recommend.

reviews.title: Brilliant!
reviews.text: Absolutely fantastic. We had a short window of time to purchase our house. Loughborough made it possible and met our needs every step of the way. Loughborough don't feel like a faceless organisation that don't care about you - because they aren't. The correspondence has been brilliant. We were informed every step of the way. Loughborough and our brilliant mortgage advisor who worked with them on our behalf took the scariness out of buying our first home. We felt confident every step of the way. Highly recommend!

reviews.title: Mortgage Advisor Rob is outstanding!
reviews.text: Rob our mortgage advisor was amazing! He made us feel at ease, we had some laughs in there which I think is important when the experience can be daunting! We have come from a specialist lender, with history of debt, so Rob listening to us, to give us our options was enlightening! There was never a single doubt of judgment which can be a worry when you’re in a position like us. Would 100% recommend! Especially Rob!

The discounted SVR option with no fee or penalty seems to be unique to Loughborough. The Advisor interview was friendly but professional and the Report was available the same day with recommendations.

reviews.title: I've been with the LBS for over 3 years now and they...
reviews.text: I've been with the LBS for over 3 years now and they've always provided an excellent service by being informative, swift and concise. It's also refreshing to deal with an organisation that doesn't offshore any of it's services or use chat functions as it means you speak to real people who know exactly what they're talking about as they're the ones actually dealing with your product. I've just completed my mortgage paperwork to continue my relationship with them for another 3 years as whilst their rates are slightly higher than other banks/building society, the excellent customer I receive is far more important to me and outweighs the negligible cost saving I would benefit from by moving elsewhere.

reviews.title: Impressive and Efficient
reviews.text: I was truly impressed by how efficiently my broker handled my application. The entire journey, from the initial submission to receiving my mortgage offer, was incredibly smooth and well-organised. What really stood out was how quickly everything happened—it took less than four weeks to get my mortgage offer! This goes to show the expertise and commitment of the team involved.

reviews.title: Excellent service, I would thoroughly recommend.

reviews.text: Fast response and actually offered us mortgage when others wary, but high rates for shared ownership which is sad and unfair

reviews.title: Processing mortgage application
reviews.text: The experience of our mortgage application was good. The application was vetted thoroughly and significant information was obtained. Because of this due diligence the process took 2 months to receive a mortgage offer. We felt that it could have been quicker. However, this was not necessarily the fault of Loughborough as there was an initial delay from our accountant. Loughborough had to request further info which delayed the case further.

reviews.title: Great personal service always
reviews.text: Prompt and courteous as always Very impressed

reviews.title: Rob my advisor was amazing throughout the process an...
reviews.text: Rob my advisor was amazing throughout the process and everyone who handled my case was very empathetic.

reviews.title: An excellent service
reviews.text: I contacted Loughborough Building Society about getting a mortgage. My case had some peculiarities and from the outset everyone was willing to assist me and did their utmost to overcome the difficulties. My personal contact, Rob Johnson, has been immensely helpful, patient, polite, and knowledgeable during the entire process. The communication with Rob, and also Ben from general enquiries. has been consistently efficient, prompt, and informative. In short my experience from Rob and the sociery is that of a friendly, professional service, which makes the usually stressful process of buying a property much more manageable, and reassuring. I can recommend Rob and Loughborough Building Society to anyone looking for straightforward mortgage advice and very high quality customer service.

reviews.title: Left me with confidence in the b s
reviews.text: My experience was very positive. The products were explained in a friendly and well presented manner. I was lead through a application process with a great deal of patience by the representative.

reviews.text: Great customer service. Always polite and professional.

reviews.title: I have been with the Lougborough for years.
reviews.text: I have been with the Lougborough for years. Their services, explaination of products and what is available is always excellent and easy to understand.

reviews.title: We have been with Loughborough for over 10 years and...
reviews.text: We have been with Loughborough for over 10 years and always had brilliant service. Recently, we took the plunge in buying a new home. Rob Johnson has dealt with our mortgage and he has been brilliant. The service has been personable, and Rob didn't just note down our answers to the questions in the initial part of the process, he listened to them and gained an understanding of our circumstances and what was important to us. He answered all of our questions and was very responsive to emails / calls, answering any questions or worries we had straight away. We felt we could really trust Rob with what was the biggest purchase of our lives and we are so grateful that in a stressful period of time, our mortgage application was looked after so well, it was one less thing to worry about.

reviews.title: Competent and thorough
reviews.text: Mortgage Adviser Rob was very thorough but also friendly. I felt that i was dealing with a competent person.

reviews.title: Initial Mortgage Enquiry
reviews.text: When initially enquiring about mortgages with the Building Society, I found that some responses could have been quicker. This however, was made up by the great customer service which I received from the mortgage advisor (Rob). He was extremely helpful throughout my application, fast to respond and went over and above to ensure that I was satisfied with everything. I would highly recommend the service which they provide.

reviews.title: The Loughborough Building Society reviews applicatio...
reviews.text: The Loughborough Building Society reviews applications quickly and securely, ensuring a hassle-free process. We use advanced technology to streamline document submission and verification, safeguarding your information with top-tier security protocols. This allows for efficient and accurate assessments, speeding up approval times.

reviews.title: Paperwork not checked properly by branch.
reviews.text: My completion date had been set, but on the day at 11.20am, they demanded another document needed to be signed and witnessed by 12pm or the money would not be released that day. My removal company had already packed up and left for my new house. I would have been homeless until at least Monday. Because of this, my keys weren't ready until after 4pm and my removal company charged overtime after 5pm, which I had to pay because of the delay. Made a stressful day even worse by the paperwork all not being checked and ready for our move until the last minute.

reviews.title: Talk to Alison. She knows her subject!
reviews.text: Alison took my call this morning. Thank you for employing such a good knowledgeable communicator. She was clear, concise and handled my rather confused explanation of what I wanted with patience, skill and good humour. To be honest she restored my confidence with telephone banking. Recent dealings with other and larger financial organisations has been immensely unsatisfactory and left me feeling very uncomfortable. As I wrote at the outset Alisons clear diction and ability to rapidly grapple with the nature of my enquiry was both pleasing and reassuring. Full marks to her and your training team.
